parent1.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour using a noise factor that depends on a custom combination of edge count and distance to guide the search towards a better solution.

parent2.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour using a noise factor that depends on a custom combination of edge count and distance to guide the search towards a better solution.

parent3.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour using a noise factor that depends on a custom combination of edge count and distance to guide the search towards a better solution.

parent4.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour using a noise factor that depends on the edge count and the edge distance to guide the search towards a better solution with a bias towards lesser used edges and longer distances.

parent5.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the sum of the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour and the reciprocal of the edge count to guide the search towards a better solution.

offspring.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the average of distances from each edge to all other edges in the local optimal tour, with a preference for longer distances, to guide the search towards a better solution.
